title: Puriya Villai Lyrics Singam 2 Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Swetha Mohan
Song: Puriya Villai
Movie: Singam 2
Lyrics: Viveka
Music: Devi Sri Prasad		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Puriya Villai idhu puriya villai
idhu puriya villai..
Mudhal mudhalaai manam
karaivadhu yen puriyavillai

Unadhu niyabagam marayavillai
adhai maraika ennidam thiramayillai
Vizhiyil paarkiren vaanavillai
adhil vilundha kaaranam thonavillai
idhu pol idhuvarai aanadhillai

Puriya Villai idhu puriya villai
idhu puriya villai..
Mudhal mudhalaai manam
karaivadhu yen puriyavillai

Kaalai ezhundhavudan en
kanavugal mudivadhillai
maalai maraindhaalum
palli koodam marapadhillai

Thozhi thunaiyayai virumbavillai
thozhan neeyum aaga villai
pechil pazhaya vegamillai
pesa yedhum vaarthaigal illai

Puriya Villai idhu puriya villai
idhu puriya villai..
Mudhal mudhalaai manam
karaivadhu yen puriyavillai

Saaral mazhayiniley udal
eeram unaravillai
saalai marangaliley indru
yeno nizhalgal illai

Kaalgal irandum tharayil illai
kaalam neram maaravillai
kaatril edhuvum asaya villai English Translation
I tried my best :)

seo.title: Puriya Villai Lyrics Singam 2 Songs Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Puriya Villai Lyrics Singam 2 Songs Lyrics from Singam 2. Read the lyrics penned by Viveka and composed by Devi Sri Prasad(DSP) and sung by Shweta Mohan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Viveka, Singam 2, Devi Sri Prasad(DSP), Shweta Mohan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
